title: A Life on the farm
creator_credit: Oz Sanderson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Oz Sanderson grew up on his farm with his two brothers during the Great Depression. His dad signed a consent form for him to join the army. While Oz was determined to serve as a pilot, the farm was always in his heart and he was more than happy to return to it after the war ended.
